com.tinkerpop.gremlin.groovy.plugin

Class AbstractGremlinPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinkerpop.gremlin.groovy.plugin.AbstractGremlinPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GremlinPlugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HadoopGremlinPlugin, SugarGremlinPlugin

    public abstract class AbstractGremlinPlugin
extends Object
implements GremlinPlugin
    A base class for a plugin that provides access to the shell and io variables. This is a good class to extend from if the plugin needs to interact with the shell in some way, such as the case with those plugins that want to utilize the RemoteAcceptor and may need access to those shell and io objects.
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)

    • Method Detail

      • pluginTo

        public void pluginTo(PluginAcceptor pluginAcceptor)
              throws IllegalEnvironmentException,
                     PluginInitializationException
        Implementers will typically execute imports of classes within their project that they want available in the console or they may use meta programming to introduce new extensions to the Gremlin.

        Provides a base implementation for plugins by grabbing the console environment variables and assigning them to the io and shell member variables.

        Specified by:
        pluginTo in interface GremlinPlugin
        Throws:
        IllegalEnvironmentException - if requireConsoleEnvironment is set to true and if either the io and shell member variables are null.
        PluginInitializationException - if there is a failure in the plugin iniitalization process

      • afterPluginTo

        public abstract void afterPluginTo(PluginAcceptor pluginAcceptor)
                            throws IllegalEnvironmentException,
                                   PluginInitializationException
        Called after the pluginTo(PluginAcceptor) method is executed which sets the io and shell member variables.
        Throws:
        IllegalEnvironmentException
        PluginInitializationException
